pageContent:
<path>Build an experience post</path>
# Build an experience post
-   Login to Devvit.
-   Start a new project.
```tsx
devvit new <my-project>
```
-   Select the `experience-post` template.
-   Navigate to your project directory.
```tsx
cd <my-project>
```
-   If you want to add some additional flair to the template code, edit the `src/main.ts` file and save your changes.
    
-   Upload your project.
```tsx
devvit upload
```
-   Use playtest to check out your experience on a test subreddit that you moderate.
```tsx
devvit playtest <your-test-subreddit-name>
```
-   Go to your test subreddit to see your experience (you might need to hit refresh).
![experience_post](./assets/experience-post-example.png)
When you're done iterating, you can [publish](dev_guide.mdx#9publish) your experience and then make it [public](dev_guide.mdx#10gopublic).
